This is a README document for R scripts associated with the grizzly bear movement project.

####grizzly_bear_dryad_data_pull###
This script pulls data belonging to Ladle et al (2018) directly from DRYAD. Data is then manually moved to the raw data folder. 

####grizzly_bear_analysis########
This script performs a basic analysis comparing grizzly bear presence in recreated areas to stream presence (a desirable habitat characteristic).
